result.html: Ar sheol tú an litirHave you sent the letter?
result.ponchtml: Ar ẛeol tú an litirHave you sent the letter?

result.eng: This is proof that I have sent the letter.
result.ga: Is cruthúnas é seo go bhfuil an litir seolta agam
result.orig: Is cruthúnas é seo go bhfuil an litir seolta agam
result.html: Is cruthúnas é seo go bhfuil an litir seolta agamThis is proof that I have sent the letter.
result.ponchtml: Is cruṫúnas é seo go ḃfuil an litir seolta agamThis is proof that I have sent the letter.

result.eng: Millions of text messages were sent over Christmas.
result.ga: Seoladh na milliúin teachtaireachtaí téacs ar feadh na Nollag
result.orig: Seoladh na milliúin teachtaireachtaí téacs ar feadh na Nollag
result.html: Seoladh na milliúin teachtaireachtaí téacs ar feadh na NollagMillions of text messages were sent over Christmas.
result.ponchtml: Seolaḋ na milliúin teaċtaireaċtaí téacs ar feaḋ na NollagMillions of text messages were sent over Christmas.

result.eng: He sent the ball across the park.
result.ga: Sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirce
result.orig: Sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirce
result.html: Sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirceHe sent the ball across the park.
result.ponchtml: Ṡeol sé an liaṫróid trasna na páirceHe sent the ball across the park.

result.html: Cuireadh chun na scoile éHe was sent to school.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ ċun na scoile éHe was sent to school.
